name: destiny-bond
effect: If the user faints before its next move, the Pokémon that fainted it will automatically faint. End-of-turn damage is ignored. This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
short_effect: If the user faints this turn, the target automatically will, too.

flavor_text.x-y: When this move is used, if the user faints, the Pokémon that landed the knockout hit also faints.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: When this move is used, if the user faints, the Pokémon that landed the knockout hit also faints.
